verses.verse: And I stood <S%G2476><s%> on the sand <S%G285><s%> of the sea, <S%G2281><s%> and saw <S%G1492><s%> a beast <S%G2342><s%> rise <S%G305><s%> up out of the sea, <S%G2281><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> and ten <S%G1176><s%> horns, <S%G2768><s%> and on his horns <S%G2768><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> crowns, <S%G1238><s%> and on his heads <S%G2776><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of blasphemy. <S%G988><s%>

And the beast <S%G2342><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> was like <S%G3664><s%> to a leopard, <S%G3917><s%> and his feet <S%G4228><s%> were as the feet <S%G4228><s%> of a bear, <S%G715><s%> and his mouth <S%G4750><s%> as the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of a lion: <S%G3023><s%> and the dragon <S%G1404><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> him his power, <S%G1411><s%> and his seat, <S%G2362><s%> and great <S%G3173><s%> authority. <S%G1849><s%>

And I saw <S%G1492><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> of his heads <S%G2776><s%> as it were wounded <S%G4969><s%> to death; <S%G2288><s%> and his deadly <S%G2288><s%> wound <S%G4127><s%> was healed: <S%G2323><s%> and all <S%G3650><s%> the world <S%G1093><s%> wondered <S%G2296><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> the beast. <S%G2342><s%>

And they worshipped <S%G4352><s%> the dragon <S%G1404><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> to the beast: <S%G2342><s%> and they worshipped <S%G4352><s%> the beast, <S%G2342><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> is like <S%G3664><s%> to the beast? <S%G2342><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> is able <S%G1410><s%> to make <S%G4170><s%> war <S%G4170><s%> with him?

And there was given <S%G1325><s%> to him a mouth <S%G4750><s%> speaking <S%G2980><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> things and blasphemies; <S%G988><s%> and power <S%G1849><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> to him to continue <S%G4160><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> and two <S%G1417><s%> months. <S%G3376><s%>

And he opened <S%G455><s%> his mouth <S%G4750><s%> in blasphemy <S%G988><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> to blaspheme <S%G987><s%> his name, <S%G3686><s%> and his tabernacle, <S%G4633><s%> and them that dwell <S%G4637><s%> in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And it was given <S%G1325><s%> to him to make <S%G4160><s%> war <S%G4171><s%> with the saints, <S%G40><s%> and to overcome <S%G3528><s%> them: and power <S%G1849><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> him over <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> kindreds, <S%G5443><s%> and tongues, <S%G1100><s%> and nations. <S%G1484><s%>

And all <S%G3956><s%> that dwell <S%G2730><s%> on the earth <S%G1093><s%> shall worship <S%G4352><s%> him, whose <S%G3739><s%> names <S%G3686><s%> are not written <S%G1125><s%> in the book <S%G976><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%> of the Lamb <S%G721><s%> slain <S%G4969><s%> from the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world. <S%G2889><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> man have <S%G2192><s%> an ear, <S%G3775><s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>

He that leads <S%G4863><s%> into captivity <S%G161><s%> shall go <S%G5217><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> captivity: <S%G161><s%> he that kills <S%G615><s%> with the sword <S%G3162><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be killed <S%G615><s%> with the sword. <S%G3162><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> is the patience <S%G5281><s%> and the faith <S%G4102><s%> of the saints. <S%G40><s%>

And I beheld <S%G1492><s%> another <S%G243><s%> beast <S%G2342><s%> coming <S%G305><s%> up out of the earth; <S%G1093><s%> and he had <S%G2192><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> horns <S%G2768><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> a lamb, <S%G721><s%> and he spoke <S%G2980><s%> as a dragon. <S%G1404><s%>

And he excercises <S%G4160><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the power <S%G1849><s%> of the first <S%G4413><s%> beast <S%G2342><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> him, and causes <S%G4160><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> and them which dwell <S%G2730><s%> therein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> to worship <S%G4352><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> beast, <S%G2342><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> deadly <S%G2288><s%> wound <S%G4127><s%> was healed. <S%G2323><s%>

And he does <S%G4160><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> wonders, <S%G4592><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that he makes <S%G4160><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> come <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from heaven <S%G3772><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%>

And deceives <S%G4105><s%> them that dwell <S%G2730><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> by the means of those <S%G3588><s%> miracles <S%G4592><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he had power <S%G1325><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of the beast; <S%G2342><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to them that dwell <S%G2730><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> that they should make <S%G4160><s%> an image <S%G1504><s%> to the beast, <S%G2342><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> the wound <S%G4127><s%> by a sword, <S%G3162><s%> and did live. <S%G2198><s%>

And he had power <S%G1325><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> life <S%G4151><s%> to the image <S%G1504><s%> of the beast, <S%G2342><s%> that the image <S%G1504><s%> of the beast <S%G2342><s%> should both <S%G2532><s%> speak, <S%G2980><s%> and cause <S%G4160><s%> that as many <S%G3745><s%> as would not worship <S%G4352><s%> the image <S%G1504><s%> of the beast <S%G2342><s%> should be killed. <S%G615><s%>

And he causes <S%G4160><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> both small <S%G3398><s%> and great, <S%G3173><s%> rich <S%G4145><s%> and poor, <S%G4434><s%> free <S%G1658><s%> and bond, <S%G1401><s%> to receive <S%G1325><s%> a mark <S%G5480><s%> in their right <S%G1188><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> in their foreheads: <S%G3359><s%>

And that no <S%G3361><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> might <S%G1410><s%> buy <S%G59><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> sell, <S%G4453><s%> save <S%G1508><s%> he that had <S%G2192><s%> the mark, <S%G5480><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the beast, <S%G2342><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of his name. <S%G3686><s%>

Here <S%G5602><s%> is wisdom. <S%G4678><s%> Let him that has <S%G2192><s%> understanding <S%G3563><s%> count <S%G5585><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of the beast: <S%G2342><s%> for it is the number <S%G706><s%> of a man; <S%G444><s%> and his number <S%G706><s%> is Six <S%G5516><s%> hundred <S%G5516><s%> three score <S%G5516><s%> and six. <S%G5516><s%>
